ygData.subject: Annoyances
ygData.msgSnippet: This is damn annoying: I can randomly choose which characters to place on a map and which treasures to use, but I can not randomly choose their coordinates.

This is damn annoying: I can randomly choose which characters to place 
on a map and which treasures to use, but I can not randomly choose 
their coordinates.

Look at this:
intX = 20
Put #1, intByteCount + 2, intX

Guess what value gets stored in that location: 2

intY = 25
Put #1, intByteCount + 4, intY

Guess what value gets stored in that location: 2

BTW, a while back I heard a rumor that Microsoft does NOT use its own 
software to write computer programs.  Is this true?
